mapper.select:
select * , (SELECT max(b.price) from item_suit a LEFT JOIN item_sku b ON a.sku_id=b.sku_id WHERE a.item_id=i.item_id ) maxPrice, (SELECT min(b.price) from item_suit a LEFT JOIN item_sku b ON a.sku_id=b.sku_id WHERE a.item_id=i.item_id ) minPrice, (SELECT max(b.sales_price) from item_suit a LEFT JOIN item_sku b ON a.sku_id=b.sku_id WHERE a.item_id=i.item_id ) maxSalesPrice, (SELECT min(b.sales_price) from item_suit a LEFT JOIN item_sku b ON a.sku_id=b.sku_id WHERE a.item_id=i.item_id ) minSalesPrice
from item i where i.item_id=1804 limit 0,100
